author: Bruno Blanes
name: PatchNotesParser
description: A set of useful commands for parsing League of Legends patch notes.
short: A League of Legends patch notes parser.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing PatchNotesParser! XD

This COG stores a dictionary of strings in a separate file called "designer_icons.json".
This COG also requires the following libraries to work properly: `bs4, typing, datetime, dateutil, requests, rivercogutils, river_mwclient`.
It will also do a few GET requests to https://leagueoflegends.com and https://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com to get all the data needed for parsing. To parse use `[p]pnparser parse all <patch_notes_version>` or type `[p]pnparser help` to see all available commands.
